report.title: Track-a-tree: results report
report.description: A list of occurrences used to build the trees results map animation.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms t on t.id=s.sample_method_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #joins# WHERE o.survey_id=#survey_id#

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: date_from
param.where: ('#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: date_to
param.where: ('#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))
